pkgmetadata.longdescription: Robust Trimmed Clustering // Provides functions for robust trimmed clustering. The methods are described in Garcia- Escudero (2008) doi:10.1214/07-AOS515, Fritz et al. (2012) doi:10.18637/jss.v047.i12, Garcia-Escudero et al. (2011) doi:10.1007/s11222-010-9194-z and others.
